item.title: 快速排序理解
item.description: 今天看到了一个快速排序比较简洁的写法，代码如下： void quickSort(vector<int>& nums, int left, int right) { if (left < right) { int pi = partition(nums, left, right); quickSort(nums, left, pi - 1); quickSort(nums, pi + 1, right); } } int partition(vector<int>& nums, int left, int right) { int pivot = left; for (int i
